TitleEnglish: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc - Memorial Edition
SummaryEnglish: A wandering warrior ends up joining a mercenary group led by a charismatic leader, in this remastered, episodic cut of the film trilogy.

1.TitleEnglish: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc I - The Egg of the King
1.SummaryEnglish: Guts, an immensely strong sword-for-hire, has little direction in his life, simply fighting one battle after the next. However, this all changes suddenly when he meets and is bested by Griffith, a beautiful and charismatic young man who leads the Band of the Hawk mercenary army. After Guts joins the Band and the relationship between the two men begins to blossom, Casca, the tough, lone swordswoman in the Band of the Hawk, struggles to accept Guts and the influence he has on the world around her. While the two men begin to fight together, Griffith continues to rise to power, all seemingly in order to reach his mysterious, prophesied goals. What lengths will Guts and Griffith go to in order to reach these goals, and where will fate take the two men?

2.TitleEnglish: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc II - The Battle for Doldrey
2.SummaryEnglish: The Band of the Hawk and their enigmatic leader Griffith continue winning battle after battle as their prestige throughout the kingdom of Midland grows. But their latest task is one that has seen failure from everyone who has attempted it: the subjugation of the impenetrable fortress of Doldrey.

3.TitleEnglish: Berserk: The Golden Age Arc III - The Advent
3.SummaryEnglish: One year has passed since Guts left the Band of the Hawk and Griffith was imprisoned by the Kingdom of Midland for treason. In the dead of night, at a camping site where they hide, the Band of the Hawk is attacked by Bakiraka assassins led by Silat. When all seems lost, Guts returns from his journey. "You destroyed everything." Crying that Griffith is nothing without Guts, Casca and Guts are joined together body and soul. Griffith is imprisoned in the oldest building in Wyndham Catle, the Tower of Rebirth.

1.SummaryEnglish: A young mercenary loner named Guts distinguishes himself in battle during a siege. As fate would have it, he also happens to catch the eye of Griffith, the charismatic young leader of the Band of the Hawk.

2.SummaryEnglish: Griffith and the Band of the Hawk are rapidly gaining favor in the eyes of the king of Midland, but not everyone is pleased. During a battle, Guts and Griffith encounter an enemy like none they've ever faced.

3.SummaryEnglish: Griffith has Guts carry out a high-risk mission for him, while he himself grows better acquainted with Princess Charlotte.

4.SummaryEnglish: After being separated from the Band of the Hawk during a battle, Guts and Casca must fight for their lives against hostile Tudor forces.

5.SummaryEnglish: Guts begins to question his place in the Band of the Hawk, while Griffith puts the band in play for his riskiest gambit yet.

6.SummaryEnglish: It's do-or-die time as the Band of the Hawk goes up against Tudor's mightiest knights in an attempt to recapture the fortress of Doldrey and bring the war to an end.

7.SummaryEnglish: The Hawks have their moment of glory as heroes of the kingdom, but Guts decides the time has finally come for him to pursue his own dreams alone.

8.SummaryEnglish: Guts sets off on his own in a dramatic fashion, and this seemingly small event triggers what becomes a downward spiral for Griffith and the Hawks.

9.SummaryEnglish: After a year has passed, Guts returns to find the Band of the Hawk reduced to a persecuted group of fugitives, with Casca as their acting leader.

10.SummaryEnglish: When the Band of the Hawk infiltrates Windham to rescue Griffith from prison, what they discover upends all their plans and expectations.

11.SummaryEnglish: As Griffith vacillates between desperate hope and hopeless despair, the Band of the Hawk is drawn into an event far beyond their comprehension.

12.SummaryEnglish: Griffith makes one last fateful decision, as the rest of the Hawks struggle for survival against virtually insurmountable odds.

13.SummaryEnglish: After the Eclipse comes to its tragic end, Guts finds his life shifting from one dark nightmare into another that's strangely familiar.
